  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nick)
      Create a player with a specified id and nickname. The nickname is final, so it can't be changed. It is unique. It initializes total points to 0. It initializes all tiles in shelf to "empty".
      Parameters:
      nick - nickname of the player.

  • Method Details

    • orderTiles

      public List<Tile> orderTiles(List<Tile> selected, List<Integer> order) throws RemoteException, InputMismatchException
      Orders the selected tiles as order passed by parameter. The order is represented by a list in which each element refers to the desired position for the ordered tiles. Example: selected("frames", "cats", "books"), order(3, 2, 1) -> ordered("books", "cats", "frames").
      Parameters:
      selected - list of selected tiles to order.
      order - represents the order in which the tiles have to be put in shelf. It is a preference of the player.
      Returns:
      orderedTiles list of selected tiles in order.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - if the order passed by parameter is wrong.
      RemoteException

    • insertInShelf

      public void insertInShelf(List<Tile> toInsert, int col) throws InputMismatchException
      Inserts the selected tiles in a single column of the shelf. The tiles are already ordered, from the bottom to the top: the first tile (index 0) goes in the first empty spot.
      Parameters:
      toInsert - a list of tiles, ordered, to be put in Shelf.
      col - chosen column.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - if the selected column has no enough space.

    • pickTiles

      public List<Tile> pickTiles(List<Position> chosen, Board b, Player player) throws RemoteException
      It checks if the selected tiles are available to be taken, and after taking the tiles it removes them from the board.
      Parameters:
      chosen - a set of position that the player has chosen.
      b - board from which the player can take the tiles.
      player - the player that is making the move.
      Returns:
      a list of tiles chosen by the player to be taken from the board.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • maxSpaceInShelf

      public int maxSpaceInShelf()
      It calculates the maximum empty space in the shelf.
      Returns:
      the maximum free space.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets player stats and shelf.

    • isShelfFull

      public boolean isShelfFull()
      Return true only if the shelf of the player is full, false otherwise.

    • calculateGeneralPoints

      public void calculateGeneralPoints()
      Calculate the points based on the rule wrote on the board, that refer to the general clustering of the shelf.

    • calculateCCPoints

      public void calculateCCPoints()
      Calculates the total points gained from the common card goals.

    • calculatePCPoint

      public void calculatePCPoint()
      Calculates the points given by the personal card.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int toSum)
      Update the total points of the player.
      Parameters:
      toSum - points to be summed to the total of the player.
